cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.DB, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with privacy concerns in recommendation systems, which is a topic that falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also discusses the perturbation of user ratings, which is a technique used in information retrieval (cs.IR) and machine learning (cs.LG) to protect user privacy. The paper also mentions the degradation of recommendation accuracy, which is a topic in database systems (cs.DB). Finally, the paper evaluates the approach in a real-world recommendation system, which falls under the category of social and information networks (cs.SI).
